Olivia Campbell

Portfolio

About Me

Hi, I'm Olivia and I career changed from Administration to Web Development. I enjoyed doing Graphic Design at college, Life Drawing, and repairing mobile devices as hobbies.

I chose to do a Fullstack Web Development course at LeWagon recently because I wanted to learn how to code and build products.

This has lead me towards doing Front End Development + Web Design because it is visually challenging and exciting.

I am available for work so let's talk and build something amazing together.
